msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides. kollesis at the payments of the column. The column is badly damaged at the top to the left downwards to the bottom. a spot of ink is in the left margin. Spots of salt are on the Recto and Verso. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated the new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the taxpayer.
